__e: I want to be honest with you Marianne, I didn't come here to do my laundry.
It seems like you two have had quite the battle. - No. - Not really.
Marianne, I told him that... he was lucky to have found someone to share his life with.
But he barely knows me. He has heard a good deal about you from Marianne and from me.
With Marianne, and now with you, I have everything I've always wanted.
There's this woman, Marianne, and she needs me--
